files.description: This is the main entry point for the Quran search application. It loads Quran data using functions from the quran_data_loader module and performs various search operations by invoking functions from the quran_search module. The results of the searches are printed to the console.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Main function to load Quran data, perform a series of search operations and print the results. It demonstrates various functionalities such as searching for words and phrases, counting occurrences, and handling verse ranges.
